document_data.name: Shelgarn's Persistent Blade
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shelgarn's persistent blade''''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s and [[sorcerer]]s. This spell was created by [[Shelgarn]].
document_data.Effects: This spell created a small blade of force capable of flitting around quickly and attacking targets. The blade was capable of striking ethereal and incorporeal creatures. The blade would continue to attack the same target unless otherwise directed by the caster.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a [[silver]] [[dagger]] to cast.
